statements: SELECT * FROM emission_reductions ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, reduction_amount FROM emission_reductions WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp FROM emission_reductions WHERE reduction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM emission_reductions WHERE location IN ('California', 'Texas') ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(reduction_amount) AS average_reduction FROM emission_reductions;
SELECT * FROM emission_reductions WHERE reduction_amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, location FROM emission_reductions WHERE location LIKE '%City' AND reduction_amount < 50;
SELECT AVG(reduction_amount) AS average_reduction FROM emission_reductions;
SELECT vehicle_id, location, timestamp FROM emission_reductions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) AS unique_locations, MAX(reduction_amount) AS max_reduction FROM emission_reductions;
SELECT * FROM emission_reduction;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle;
SELECT id, reduction_amount FROM emission_reduction WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT id, reduction_amount, date_recorded FROM emission_reduction WHERE reduction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM emission_reduction WHERE reduction_amount > 100 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT v.make, v.model, e.reduction_amount FROM vehicle v INNER JOIN emission_reduction e ON v.id = e.vehicle_id WHERE v.year >= 2015 ORDER BY v.make, v.model DESC;
SELECT e.date_recorded, SUM(e.reduction_amount) AS total_reduction FROM emission_reduction e GROUP BY e.date_recorded HAVING total_reduction > 500 ORDER BY e.date_recorded;
SELECT v.make, v.model, COUNT(e.id) AS num_records FROM vehicle v LEFT JOIN emission_reduction e ON v.id = e.vehicle_id GROUP BY v.id HAVING num_records >= 3 ORDER BY num_records DESC, v.make ASC;

SELECT v.make, v.year, MAX(e.reduction_amount) AS max_reduction FROM vehicle v LEFT JOIN emission_reduction e ON v.id = e.vehicle_id WHERE v.year < 2020 GROUP BY v.make, v.year HAVING max_reduction > 200 ORDER BY max_reduction DESC, v.make ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM emission_reduction;
SELECT vehicle_id, emission_reduction_amount FROM emission_reduction WHERE emission_reduction_amount > 1000;
SELECT make, model FROM electric_vehicle WHERE year >= 2020 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT station_name, capacity FROM charging_station WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT id, date_recorded FROM emission_reduction WHERE vehicle_id = 3 AND date_recorded >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM emission_reduction WHERE emission_reduction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, emission_reduction_amount FROM emission_reduction WHERE vehicle_id = 3 ORDER BY emission_reduction_amount ASC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM electric_vehicle WHERE year >= 2020 ORDER BY make, year DESC;
SELECT station_name, location FROM charging_station WHERE capacity >= 50 ORDER BY location;

SELECT id, make, model, year, emission_reduction_amount FROM emission_reduction JOIN electric_vehicle ON emission_reduction.vehicle_id = electric_vehicle.id WHERE emission_reduction_amount < 500 ORDER BY make, year ASC;
SELECT id, vehicle_id, emission_reduction_amount FROM emission_reduction;
SELECT make, model, year FROM electric_vehicle WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT emission_standard, standard_limit FROM emission_standards WHERE standard_limit > 10;
SELECT id, vehicle_id, emission_reduction_amount FROM emission_reduction WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM emission_reduction WHERE emission_reduction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY emission_reduction_amount DESC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM electric_vehicle WHERE year > 2018 ORDER BY make, year;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE location LIKE '%City%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM emission_standards WHERE emission_standard = 'Euro 6';
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(emission_reduction_amount) AS total_reduction FROM emission_reduction GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_reduction > 5000 ORDER BY total_reduction DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_info ORDER BY manufacturing_year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicle_info WHERE vehicle_make = 'Tesla';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_data WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT station_name, location, operator FROM charging_stations WHERE operator = 'ABC Charging';
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM route_info ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicle_info ORDER BY manufacturing_year ASC;
SELECT station_name, operator FROM charging_stations WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_data ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM route_info WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
